Package ninja.jira.skeletonkey.app.controller

Class PayeeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ninja.jira.skeletonkey.app.controller.PayeeController
  • @CrossOrigin
@Controller
@RequestMapping(path="api/payee")
public class PayeeController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the controller for class Payee. Uses GET methods when retrieving data from db Uses POST methods otherwise

    • Method Detail

      • addNewPayee

        @PostMapping(path="/add")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addNewPayee​(@RequestParam
                                                              java.lang.String accountNumber,
                                                              @RequestParam
                                                              java.lang.String userID,
                                                              @RequestParam
                                                              java.lang.String bank,
                                                              @RequestParam
                                                              java.lang.String fullName,
                                                              @RequestParam
                                                              java.lang.String initials)
        This method adds a new payee to the db
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - identifies the account of the payee
        userID - user adding the payee, tied to a user
        bank - bank of the payee
        fullName - name of the payee
        initials - for easier reference
        Returns:
        payee object if successful, error message otherwise

      • getPayee

        @RequestMapping(path="/get")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getPayee​(@RequestParam
                                                           java.lang.String userID,
                                                           @RequestParam
                                                           java.lang.String accountNumber)
        This method returns payee object matching a user and payee's account number
        Parameters:
        userID - identifies a user
        accountNumber - identifies payee's account
        Returns:
        payee object if successful, error otherwise

      • getAllAccounts

        @RequestMapping(path="/all")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllAccounts()
        This method returns all payee from payee db Does not check if list is empty
        Returns:
        payee list

      • getAllPayeesByUser

        @RequestMapping(path="/user")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllPayeesByUser​(@RequestParam
                                                                     java.lang.String userID)
        This method gets all payees belonging to a user
        Parameters:
        userID - identifies the user
        Returns:
        payee list if successful, error message otherwise

      • updatePayee

        @PostMapping(path="/update")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updatePayee​(@RequestParam
                                                              java.lang.Integer payeeID,
                                                              java.lang.String accountNumber,
                                                              java.lang.String userID,
                                                              java.lang.String bank,
                                                              java.lang.String fullName,
                                                              java.lang.String initials)
        This method updates the payee object in payee db
        Parameters:
        payeeID - identifies the payee(id auto generated by db, id number shared across all tables)
        accountNumber - identifies the payee's account
        userID - identifies the user
        bank - payee's bank
        fullName - payee's full name
        initials - payee's initial
        Returns:
        updated payee object if successful, error message otherwise

      • deletePayee

        @PostMapping(path="/delete")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deletePayee​(@RequestParam
                                                              java.lang.Integer payeeID)
        This method deletes a payee matching payee id
        Parameters:
        payeeID - identifies the payee
        Returns:
        success message if successful, error message otherwise

      • deleteAllAccounts

        @PostMapping(path="/deleteall")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteAllAccounts()
        This method deletes all payees in the payee db Does not check if db is empty
        Returns:
        success message
